module.description: Run the first example from STATS 330 lecture 3, returning three plots as PDFs

source.script: full_script <- readLines(url("https://www.stat.auckland.ac.nz/~stats330/lects/330_Lecture3_2015.R", method = "libcurl")) full_script[19] <- "exchange = read.csv(url(\"https://www.stat.auckland.ac.nz/~stats330/datasets.dir/hb1.csv\", method = \"libcurl\"))" subset <- full_script[16:46] eval(parse(text = subset))
